name: Ruin Prototype
description:
Ruin is a prototype for a physics-based action puzzler where you must bash, burn and sap the bricks from towers to escort your caravan down a dangerous path.

A quick experiment to see what our group could do with different emergent gameplay and puzzle systems and push the envelope on how a physics puzzler could play out.

STANDARD CONTROLS

- WASD to move horizontally

- Shift to move quickly

- Q and E to cycle through bomb types

- Left Mouse Button to 'sap' and remove bricks

- Right Mouse Button to place bombs on a surface

- Space to confirm a selection

DEBUGGING CONTROLS

- R to reset the current scene

- Esc. to return to the level select

Feel free to give it a try and let us know what you think!

Game Created by Devon Wiersma, Daylan Rogan, Devin Murray, Ali O'Connor and Zhenni Dong
